vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.32;
daughter of: Heber (H2268);
sister of: Japhlet (H3310), Shomer (H7763H) and Hotham (H2369)
§ Shua = "wealth"
an Asheritess, daughter of Heber and sister to Japhlet, Shomer, and Hotham
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hija de Héber; tribu de Aser
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
書雅 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "財富"
1) 亞設家族的希別的女兒, 是雅弗勒, 朔默, 和何坦的妹子 (代上 7:32)
2) 一位迦南地女子, 猶大的妻子, 生珥, 俄南, 和示拉(代上 2:3| 譯作 '書亞')
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
书雅 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "财富"
1) 亚设家族的希别的女儿, 是雅弗勒, 朔默, 和何坦的妹子 (代上 7:32)
2) 一位迦南地女子, 犹大的妻子, 生珥, 俄南, 和示拉(代上 2:3| 译作 '书亚')

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.38.2;
father of: Bath-shua (H1323I)
Another spelling of shu.a (שׁוּעַ "Shua" H7770)
§ Shua = "wealth"
an Asheritess, daughter of Heber and sister to Japhlet, Shomer, and Hotham

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.38.2;
daughter of: Shua (H7770); married to Judah (H3063);
mother of: Er (H6147), Onan (H0209) and Shelah (H7956)
Combined with bat (בַּת "Bath" H1323I)
§ Shua = "wealth"
an Asheritess, daughter of Heber and sister to Japhlet, Shomer, and Hotham
